abstract: The resignation of Ellyn McColgan, a Fidelity executive who had been considered an heir apparent to the chairman and chief executive, Edward C. Johnson III, may have paved the way for Rodger Lawson, president of Fidelity to take the reins.
lead_paragraph: The resignation of Ellyn McColgan, a Fidelity executive who had been considered an heir apparent to the chairman and chief executive, Edward C. Johnson III, may have paved the way for Rodger Lawson, president of Fidelity to take the reins.

headline.main: At Fidelity, a Born-Again Star — or a Has-Been?
